feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:05 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -12.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 10:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -12.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -14.0°C
Wind: NW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon except minus 9 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny except mainly cloudy along parts of the coast. Blowing snow along exposed areas of the coast near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast near noon. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon except minus 9 along parts of the coast. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 16 except temperature steady near minus 10 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16 except temperature steady near minus 10 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
